reuters.title: ALMI GROUP ACQUIRES INTEREST IN CLEARVIEW BAKING
reuters.body: <ALMI Group L.P.> said its co-chairmen, Michael Landes and Albert Schwartz, and its vice chairman, Michael Spiegler, have acquired a 50 pct equity interest in <Clearview Baking Corp> for undisclosed terms. A. Dale Mayo, Clearview's president and chief executive officer, will retain a 50 pct interest in the company, ALMI Group said. Reuter 
